proposal1.heroHeadline: ThriveLine is burning 300 hours a year on manual proposals. Here's the cost in time and lost growth.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Manually crafting proposals for web design and SEO eats valuable hours. Automate with a 47-second process.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Every detail below is a current drain on time, money, and potential growth.

problems.title: Time Sink
problems.description: Manually creating proposals takes 5 hours each. That‚Äôs 300 hours a year not spent on client work or business growth.

problems.title: Lost Deals
problems.description: Delayed proposals mean lost momentum. Each day waiting is a day a prospect could choose a competitor.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Each proposal lacks consistent branding. Inconsistency costs you credibility and potential trust with clients.

problems.title: Human Errors
problems.description: Manual entry leads to errors. Mistakes can cost deals and damage professional relationships.

problems.title: Resource Drain
problems.description: With only two people, every minute spent on proposals is a minute not enhancing client sites or SEO strategies.

problems.title: Missed Opportunities
problems.description: Time spent on proposals limits your ability to pursue new leads. Each lead not pursued is potential revenue lost.

proposal1.solutionIntro: This system replaces all that wasted effort with streamlined efficiency.

solutions.title: Instant Proposals
solutions.description: Crafting proposals takes hours. This system delivers them in under a minute, saving precious time.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Proposals often lack consistent design. The system ensures every proposal is on-brand and professional.

solutions.title: Error-Free Documents
solutions.description: Manual entries lead to mistakes. Automated proposals ensure accuracy and precision every time.

solutions.title: Prospect Analysis
solutions.description: Understanding prospects takes time. The system quickly analyzes and integrates insights into proposals.

solutions.title: Lead Tracking
solutions.description: Manual tracking is cumbersome. The system tracks engagement, helping prioritize hot leads.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for ThriveLine's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for ThriveLine around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for ThriveLine.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Online Presence with ThriveLine's Expertise
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Let's revitalize your digital strategy with our comprehensive design services. Together, we'll enhance your online impact and boost conversions.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently losing potential revenue and growth opportunities.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Every visitor not converting is a sale slipping through your fingers. Current rates are below industry standards, impacting your bottom line.

problems.title: Outdated Website Design
problems.description: A dated look can drive customers away. Your design isn't reflecting the innovation your brand offers, costing you credibility.

problems.title: Poor Mobile Experience
problems.description: With over 50% of traffic from mobile, every awkward interaction is a customer lost. Your current site isn't optimized for mobile users.

problems.title: Weak Brand Identity
problems.description: Inconsistent branding confuses potential customers. Without a strong identity, you're missing out on building brand loyalty.

problems.title: Ineffective SEO Strategy
problems.description: Without strong search visibility, potential clients can't find you. You're losing ground to competitors who rank higher.

problems.title: Limited Social Media Engagement
problems.description: Your social channels aren't driving traffic as expected. This lack of engagement is a missed opportunity to connect with your audience.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Here‚Äôs how ThriveLine will solve these challenges for Acme Corp.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Revamp your site to improve user experience and boost conversions. Our design will reflect your brand's innovation.

solutions.title: Mobile Optimization
solutions.description: Ensure seamless mobile interactions. We'll make sure your site is fully responsive, capturing mobile users effectively.

solutions.title: SEO Strategy
solutions.description: Enhance your search visibility to attract more potential clients. We'll optimize your content and structure to climb search rankings.

solutions.title: Social Media Management
solutions.description: Increase engagement on social platforms. Our strategy will connect you with your audience, driving traffic and brand loyalty.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Here's why ThriveLine is your perfect partner.

whyUsCards.title: Personalized Approach
whyUsCards.description: We tailor every strategy to your unique needs, ensuring the best results for your business.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Track Record

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Solutions

whyUsCards.title: Friendly Team

lead.company_description:
Transforming Kelowna Businesses Through Web Design & SEO Excellence.
From tailored websites to strategic local SEO, we empower Kelowna businesses to reach new heights online. Discover the difference a custom digital approach can make for your brand.
